mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Partiot, Clemence
mdRecord.dcterms:description: I hope you have received the ? I sent you yesterday. Let me offer you today a very little token of my attachment to you. A little dog the emblem of my ? and fidelity in what I promised you then a silver medal which has been made for my poor aunt Campan and which you will perhaps find precious for her sake and lastly a little French theater fan which belonged to my poor mother. I embrace you in the French way "de tout mon coeur." God bless you and give you a happy passage.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Clemence Partiot to Madame Hay., 4 June 1834
